definition: stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
as/as if/such as
to glue/glue/gum/rubber
to seem/to appear/to resemble/similar/-like/pseudo-/(more) than
old variant of 似[si4]
see 似的[shi4 de5]
paint/lacquer/CL:道[dao4]/to paint (furniture, walls etc)

sentences.english: They cling to each other as if there were no tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他们如胶似漆的像是没有明天了。

sentences.english: "They love each other deeply, like glue and varnish, " described their Chinese friends.
sentences.chinese: 朋友们说，他们爱得很深，如胶似漆。

sentences.english: He sticks to her like glue, ie never leaves her.
sentences.chinese: 他如胶似漆地寸步不离开她。

sentences.english: Since then, he comes to here once a month and we get together.
sentences.chinese: 之后，他每个月都来看我，我们在一起，如胶似漆。

sentences.english: They are so attached to each other, it's like they are glued together.
sentences.chinese: 他们两个如胶似漆，好像被胶水黏在一起似的。

sentences.english: Doris and Flora are inseparable. They're like two peas in a pod.
sentences.chinese: 多丽丝和弗洛拉两个形影不离，如胶似漆。

definition: to fall head over heels in love/to be passionately in love
to treat each other as an honored guest (idiom)/mutual respect between husband and wife
loath to part (idiom); emotionally close and unwilling to separate
loving affection (in a couple)/conjugal love
close relation, no gap (idiom); intimate and nothing can come between
to bill and coo (idiom)/to whisper sweet nothings to one another/to be very much in love
loath to part (idiom); emotionally close and unwilling to separate
lit. heads rubbing together (idiom)/fig. very close relationship
newlyweds
love is more solid than gold (idiom)
to be estranged
to have an affinity with each other (idiom)/to find each other congenial
the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
(of a couple) to be sweet to each other/lovey-dovey/variant of 膩味|腻味[ni4 wei5]
to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
to be madly in love
pinyin: ai4 de5 si3 qu4 huo2 lai2
